'''Campfire Tales Skin Pack'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://mojang.com/2016/10/eek-the-campfire-tales-skin-pack-creeps-onto-pocket-win-10-today/|title=Eek! Campfire Tales skin pack haunts Pocket / Win 10!|section=|website=[[Mojang blog]]|author=[[Marsh Davies]]|date=October 5, 2016|quote=|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161007092404/http://mojang.com/2016/10/eek-the-campfire-tales-skin-pack-creeps-onto-pocket-win-10-today/}}</ref> is a celebratory skin pack for Halloween 2016 that includes 16 skins themed around horror.
